name: Fortune's Tale
description:
In the deepest depths lie a treasure so great, it's said to make you never want to leave. This is the tale of one adventurer who made that journey.

A short game made for Community Game Jam with the theme "THE GAME IS A LIAR". Honestly I used this project as a way to get to grips with many different aspects of Unity, so hopefully it still fits the theme! I learned a great deal throughout the week, so next time I hope to produce something much better.

Unfortunately I couldn't figure out the music in time, so I suggest unless you enjoy playing a mostly silent video game, that you play something like this in the background: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SDuifShJXBo
